About.paragraph: Discover a culinary adventure like no other at Pioxno, home to three distinctive brand outlets in Bengaluru. From the delectable delights of Savoria to the aromatic brews of BrewMist and the irresistible treats of CraveHaven, we are dedicated to serving you the best in freshly prepared food and beverages.
Why: Fresh & Quality: Enjoy freshly prepared food and beverages made with top-notch ingredients.
Variety: Explore diverse culinary experiences with our three unique brand outlets.
Warm Service: Experience genuine hospitality from our friendly staff.
Expansion Vision: We aim to spread our exceptional taste across India in the next five years.

Services.name: Taste of Pioxno
Services.text: Immerse yourself in the rich flavors of North India with our authentic dishes, including fragrant curries and hearty thalis, all prepared with time-honored recipes and premium ingredients.

Services.name: Pioxno Barista
Services.text: Elevate your coffee experience with expertly crafted brews and indulge in a classic English breakfast spread, meticulously prepared to satisfy your cravings for both caffeine and comfort.

Services.name: Pohawala By Pioxno
Services.text: Experience the warmth of Indian hospitality with our comforting poha dishes and aromatic chai, perfect for a quick bite or a leisurely snack break.
